page.title: 04Farming AA
page.content: All of the farms in our area are{owned by the farmers except for two. The {average size}is 58 hectares. The size of the farms goes from 4 to 145 hectares. Most of the small farms are around Eppleby and Caldwell. The {fields}were quite small except in one square where the land has been sold without the farm house and hedges have been taken out. Most of the farms are either{mixed or arable.}Wheat and barley take up almost half of the land. Rape is grown on 10% of the land. The other crops which are grown are potatoes, peas, fruit, oats, turnips and kale. Only 6 of the farmers employ any{workers.}Most of the{farm houses}are over 100 years old but 2 are newer. There is 1 factory farm and 3 dairy farms. The most common kinds of{livestock}are sheep and beef cattle.
